snippet: Jon Niese, recovering from shoulder discomfort, threw 50 pitches in his first start of spring training, and he did not seem at all concerned about giving up four runs in two innings.
lead_paragraph: Jon Niese, recovering from shoulder discomfort, threw 50 pitches in his first start of spring training, and he did not seem at all concerned about giving up four runs in two innings.

headline.main: Mets’ Niese Is Rocked, and Is Happy for It
headline.print_headline: Mets’ Niese Is Rocked, and Is Happy for It
